articles.description: Xiaomi plans to release two versions of the Mi 11 Lite, the POCO F3, POCO F3 Pro and the POCO X3 Pro in multiple markets, according to a new report. Apparently, Xiaomi will sell the Redmi K40 Pro as the POCO F3 Pro, like the POCO F2 Pro and the Redmi K30 Pro.
articles.content: Xiaomi Firmware Updater may be an open-source community project that provides download links for Xiaomi devices, making it an invaluable tool for those who want to update their smartphones manually. … [+1440 chars]

articles.title: Realme confirms Realme UI 2.0 on the Realme GT 5G - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Realme published another post on Weibo to confirm some Realme GT 5G specs. The phone is confirmed to come with Android 11 and Realme UI 2.0.
articles.content: Realme is gearing up to launch its first 2021 flagship the next Thursday, March 04. After several leaks with the Realme Race codename, the device’s name is finally confirmed as Realme GT 5G. Since th… [+2224 chars]
